Package pageManagement

Class HomeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • pageManagement.HomeController
  • public class HomeController
extends java.lang.Object
    Class handling the JavaFX objects from the Home scene (defined in home.fxml).

      • joinOrCreateGroup

        private void joinOrCreateGroup()
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Action linked to the "join or create group" icon/JFXButton. Opens a new GroupSettings stage, where it's possible to configurate the settings of the group you want to join/create.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If error when FXMLLoader.load() is called

      • actionDisconnectButton

        private void actionDisconnectButton()
        Action linked to the "Déconnexion" JFXButton. Disconnects from the server, leaves the Home page, then switches to the Login scene.
